question: Which among the following makes the Cornea Transplantation easy and used more widely ?
option2: Cornea does not link up with blood vessels
answer: Cornea does not link up with blood vessels
explanation: A cornea transplant also called as keratoplasty is a surgical procedure to replace part of your cornea with corneal tissue from a donor. Cornea does not link up with blood vessels, this makes the Cornea Transplantation easy and used more widely.
